summary: Provides functionality to read and write NumPy .npz archive files using CuPy arrays, including a class that offers dictionary‑style access and context‑manager support, as well as helper functions for saving arrays in regular or compressed .npz formats.
business_intent: Facilitate persistent storage and exchange of multiple CuPy arrays in a single .npz file, ensuring compatibility with NumPy workflows and enabling efficient loading and saving of array data.
